title: 78/539/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 June 1978 approving the plans for the accelerated eradication of brucellosis and tuberculosis put forward by the French Republic (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 6 June 1978  approving the plans for the accelerated eradication of brucellosis and tuberculosis put forward by the French Republic  (Only the French text is authentic)  (78/539/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plans for the accelerated eradication of brucellosis and tuberculosis put forward by the French Republic are hereby approved.
The French Republic shall put into effect by 1 July 1978 the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to implement the plans referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 June 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 145, 13.6.1977, p. 44.
